title: BANK RELATED KCET and coding
content: Do kcet students also need union bank account, mostly yes but if i go make right now because its quite late where do I give my account number and stuff and can i only make in the pesu branch or any branch near my house, plus in 2nd sem is it gonna be c or c++

comments.body:
•Kcet students do need a union bank account 
•You can make it at any union bank branch 
It will be accepted as long as the name is the same as what you have given to college 
•C
after making account where should i submit my account number
Ig they will ask you to submit bank account details if you do get a scholarship
